about_the_game:
"Border Jumper" is a mysterious RogueLike strategy turn RPG game. Inside a wired spaceship, you need to carefully choose the combination of skills and props, explore and uncover all the truths. In this game, you will experience unique gameplay and exciting challenges, bringing endless fun.

Game features:

*Randomly arranged mazes and rooms

Every time you enter the maze, it is a brand new experience. The different rooms guide you to explore, collect various props obtained from stage, eliminate or avoid enemies in the maze and rooms, and use element reactions and other mechanisms within the map to gain advantages.

*Characters' weapons and skills

Each character will carry their own unique weapons and skills, and as the game progresses, there will be a variety of weapon parts to obtain more weapon abilities.

*Elemental reaction system

Players may get contact with four different elements within a level, and their pairwise combination will trigger a total of six different reactions that may bring benefits and advantages to the player. However, if they are unlucky, these reactions may also push the players into a desperate situation.

*A variety of props

All the props in the game are usable, each with its own abilities and a limit on the number of uses. Some props may also have side effects, but as long as they are used well, they can definitely bring fun and a sense of security to exploration.

*Enemies hidden in shadows

There are various enemies scattered in the level, and due to limitations in vision and lighting, they are not always visible. Therefore, don't be surprised when encountering enemies that jump out from the dark.

There are more:

1. A brand new experience with the strategy RougeLike gameplay

2. Synchronized turn, each action is full of changes

3. Randomly generated maps, props, and events
